resources.title: Form I-589 (Application for Asylum)
resources.description: The official form used to apply for asylum and for withholding of removal in the United States. Must be filed within one year of arrival unless exceptions apply.

resources.title: Form I-765 (Work Authorization Document)
resources.description: Application for Employment Authorization Document (EAD). Asylum seekers can apply 150 days after filing their asylum application.

resources.title: Form I-485 (Adjust Status to Permanent Resident)
resources.description: Application to adjust status to permanent resident. Asylees can apply one year after being granted asylum.

resources.title: Asylum Guide - USCIS Official
resources.description: Comprehensive guide to the asylum process from USCIS, including eligibility requirements, application procedures, and what to expect.

resources.title: Work Authorization for Asylum Seekers
resources.description: Step-by-step guide on how to obtain work authorization while your asylum case is pending, including timeline and requirements.

resources.title: Credible Fear Interview Guide
resources.description: Information about the credible fear screening process for asylum seekers who arrive at the border or are in removal proceedings.

resources.title: Asylum Statistics - Fiscal Year 2023
resources.description: Official USCIS statistics on asylum applications, approvals, denials, and processing times for fiscal year 2023.

resources.title: Case Processing Times
resources.description: Check current processing times for asylum applications, work permits, and other immigration benefits by USCIS office.

resources.title: Asylum Office Locator
resources.description: Find the asylum office that handles cases in your area, including addresses, phone numbers, and jurisdiction information.

resources.title: Pro Bono Legal Services Directory
resources.description: Directory of organizations providing free or low-cost legal assistance to asylum seekers and immigrants.

resources.title: Country Conditions Reports
resources.description: U.S. State Department country reports on human rights practices and conditions that may support asylum claims.

resources.title: Immigration Court Practice Manual
resources.description: Comprehensive manual for immigration court proceedings, including asylum hearings and legal procedures.

resources.title: Withholding of Removal
resources.description: Information about withholding of removal as an alternative form of protection for those who don't qualify for asylum.

resources.title: One-Year Filing Deadline for Asylum
resources.description: Detailed explanation of the one-year filing deadline for asylum applications and available exceptions.

resources.title: Preparing for Your Asylum Interview
resources.description: Guide on how to prepare for your asylum interview, including what documents to bring and what to expect.

resources.title: Derivative Asylum for Family Members
resources.description: Information about how spouses and unmarried children under 21 can be included in an asylum application.

resources.title: What Happens if Asylum is Denied?
resources.description: Information about the appeals process and options available if your asylum application is denied.

resources.title: Refugee Travel Document for Asylees
resources.description: How to apply for a refugee travel document if you've been granted asylum and need to travel outside the U.S.
